headline: Is PDD Holdings (PDD) Zhang Lei’s Top Pick?
summary: PDD Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:PDD) is Zhang Lei’s largest holding, accounting for 27.76% ($1.14 billion) of the billionaire’s total portfolio. We recently published a list of youngest hedge fund billionaires and their top stock picks. As of February 13, 2026, about 70% of analysts who cover PDD Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:PDD) are still bullish. The consensus price […]
